items.label: 539fb538ec4f024bc1dbf27d
items.description:
Monthly minimum charge: for each consumer shall be $2.16, which shall include the use of electric current 1 to 20 KW hours per month.


The minimum demand charge is $1.50 for the first 3 kilowatts of the Billing KW plus $1.50 per kilowatt for all additional kilowatts of the Billing KW.


SERVICE TO MULTIPLE DWELLINGS: When two or more separate dwelling units are supplied through one meter, the above quantities in the Residential Service Rate will be multiplied by the number of dwelling units supplied.

All bills rendered under this rate schedule are subject to Rider A-Purchased Power Expense Adjustment Clause, applied to all KWh supplied during the billing period.
items.name: Residential service rate (Outside borough)
items.utility: Borough of Schuylkill Haven, Pennsylvania (Utility Company)
